# close()

**Instance Method**

Closes the picker interface.

## Declaration

```swift
func close()
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePickerDelegate/sharingServicePicker(_:didChoose:)] method will be invoked if the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePicker/delegate] is set to `nil`.

## Displaying the sharing service picker

- **show(relativeTo:of:preferredEdge:)**: Shows the picker interface and populates it with the relevant sharing services.
